bibliography.AU: Philippe, G; Montaigne, F; Schiel, JC; Georgeaux, E; Gruet, C; Roy, PY; Force, P; Mege, P
bibliography.AF: Philippe, Guy; Montaigne, Francois; Schiel, Jean-Christophe; Georgeaux, Eric; Gruet, Christophe; Roy, Pierre-Yves; Force, Pierre; Mege, Philippe
bibliography.TI: LTE Resistance to Jamming capability To which extend a standard LTE system is able to resist to intentional jammers
bibliography.SO: 2013 MILITARY COMMUNICATIONS AND INFORMATION SYSTEMS CONFERENCE (MCC)
bibliography.CT: Military Communications and Information Systems Conference (MCC)
bibliography.AB: This paper is providing an analysis on how an LTE-based mobile broadband communication system would be able to survive and resist to intentional jammers as encountered in some military use cases. This analysis has been developed using our LTE knowledge for professional usage and our own expertise on jammers characteristics and use cases.
bibliography.C1: [Philippe, Guy; Montaigne, Francois; Schiel, Jean-Christophe; Georgeaux, Eric; Gruet, Christophe; Roy, Pierre-Yves; Force, Pierre; Mege, Philippe] CASSIDIAN, Elancourt, France
bibliography.RP: Philippe, G (reprint author), CASSIDIAN, Elancourt, France.
bibliography.PA: 345 E 47TH ST, NEW YORK, NY 10017 USA
